column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I am fairly certain our menu was picked for us as we had little cards with our group and the food choices on it
column2: and I have no problems with that. I am notorious for taking my time ordering so having someone choose for me is just the bee's knee's (or spider's elbow?). The endive salad was light and fruity
column3: the chicken skewers and mayo-y dipping sauce were awesome
column4: but the best of all was the spicy potato dish. On their own
column6: but with the orange sauce that comes on the side they are about 10 times better.
